df-htpy
blocks.content: Define the function which takes topological spaces ` X , Y ` and two continuous functions ` F , G : X --> Y ` and returns the class of homotopies from ` F ` to ` G ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-htpy(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5) {
  |- wceq(chtpy, cmpo(s0, s1, ctop, ctop, cmpo(s2, s3, co(cv(s0), ccn, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), ccn, cv(s1)), crab(s4, co(co(cv(s0), ctx, cii), ccn, cv(s1)), wral(s5, cuni(cv(s0)), wa(wceq(co(cv(s5), cv(s4), nat0), cfv(cv(s2), cv(s5))), wceq(co(cv(s5), cv(s4), nat1), cfv(cv(s3), cv(s5)))))))))
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s5)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s5)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s4, s5)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s5)
  -| diffss(s1, s5)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-htpy(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5) {
  ‚ä¢ Htpy =(s0 ‚àà Top, s1 ‚àà Top ‚Ü¶(s2 ‚àà(s0[Cn]s1), s3 ‚àà(s0[Cn]s1)‚Ü¶ { s4 ‚àà((s0[tX]II)[Cn]s1)| ‚àÄ(s5 ‚àà ‚ãÉ s0,((s5[s4]0)=(s2 ` s5)‚àß(s5[s4]1)=(s3 ` s5)))}))
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s4, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
}

blocks.name: df-phtpy
blocks.content: Define the class of path homotopies between two paths ` F , G : II --> X ` ; these are homotopies (in the sense of ~ df-htpy ) which also preserve both endpoints of the paths throughout the homotopy. Definition of [Hatcher] p. 25. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-phtpy(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  |- wceq(cphtpy, cmpt(s0, ctop, cmpo(s1, s2, co(cii, ccn, cv(s0)), co(cii, ccn, cv(s0)), crab(s3, co(cv(s1), co(cii, chtpy, cv(s0)), cv(s2)), wral(s4, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), wa(wceq(co(nat0, cv(s3), cv(s4)), cfv(cv(s1), nat0)), wceq(co(nat1, cv(s3), cv(s4)), cfv(cv(s1), nat1))))))))
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-phtpy(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  ‚ä¢ PHtpy =(s0 ‚àà Top ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà(II[Cn]s0), s2 ‚àà(II[Cn]s0)‚Ü¶ { s3 ‚àà(s1[(II[Htpy]s0)]s2)| ‚àÄ(s4 ‚àà(0[[,]]1),((0[s3]s4)=(s1 ` 0)‚àß(1[s3]s4)=(s1 ` 1)))}))
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s4)
}

blocks.name: ishtpy

  diff.hs0.w((w0 ‚àß(hs1 = c1 ‚àß hs2 = c4)))
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, (hs1 = c1 ‚àß hs2 = c4))

}

blocks.content: A homotopy is a continuous function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Feb-2015.)

thm htpycn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(co(c0, co(c1, chtpy, c2), c3), co(co(c1, ctx, cii), ccn, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, ccn, c2)))

} = {
  ssrdv(hs0, co(c0, co(c1, chtpy, c2), c3), co(co(c1, ctx, cii), ccn, c2), w0)
  syl6bi(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, co(c1, chtpy, c2), c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(co(c1, ctx, cii), ccn, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(co(c1, ctx, cii), ccn, c2)), wral(hs1, c4, wa(wceq(co(cv(hs1), cv(hs0), nat0), cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), wceq(co(cv(hs1), cv(hs0), nat1), cfv(c3, cv(hs1)))))))
  ishtpy(hs1, cv(hs0), c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  simpl(wcel(cv(hs0), co(co(c1, ctx, cii), ccn, c2)), wral(hs1, c4, wa(wceq(co(cv(hs1), cv(hs0), nat0), cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), wceq(co(cv(hs1), cv(hs0), nat1), cfv(c3, cv(hs1))))))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, co(c1, chtpy, c2), c3))
  diff.hs0.c(co(co(c1, ctx, cii), ccn, c2))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
}

blocks.name: htpyi
blocks.content: A homotopy evaluated at its endpoints. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm htpyi(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wa(wceq(co(c0, c2, nat0), cfv(c3, c0)), wceq(co(c0, c2, nat1), cfv(c4, c0))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, cfv(ctopon, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, co(c5, ccn, c6)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, co(c5, ccn, c6)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, co(c3, co(c5, chtpy, c6), c4)))
} = {
  sylan(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wa(wceq(co(c0, c2, nat0), cfv(c3, c0)), wceq(co(c0, c2, nat1), cfv(c4, c0))), wral(hs0, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c2, nat0), cfv(c3, cv(hs0))), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c2, nat1), cfv(c4, cv(hs0))))))
  simprd(w0, wral(hs0, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c2, nat0), cfv(c3, cv(hs0))), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c2, nat1), cfv(c4, cv(hs0))))), wcel(c2, co(co(c5, ctx, cii), ccn, c6)))
  mpbid(w0, wa(wcel(c2, co(co(c5, ctx, cii), ccn, c6)), wral(hs0, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c2, nat0), cfv(c3, cv(hs0))), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c2, nat1), cfv(c4, cv(hs0)))))), wcel(c2, co(c3, co(c5, chtpy, c6), c4)))
  ishtpy(hs0, c2, c3, c5, c6, c4, c1, w0)
  rspccva(hs0, c1, c0, wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c2, nat0), cfv(c3, cv(hs0))), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c2, nat1), cfv(c4, cv(hs0)))), wa(wceq(co(c0, c2, nat0), cfv(c3, c0)), wceq(co(c0, c2, nat1), cfv(c4, c0))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c2, nat0), cfv(c3, cv(hs0))), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c2, nat1), cfv(c4, cv(hs0))), wceq(co(c0, c2, nat0), cfv(c3, c0)), wceq(co(c0, c2, nat1), cfv(c4, c0)))
  eqeq12d(co(cv(hs0), c2, nat0), cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), co(c0, c2, nat0), cfv(c3, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c0, c2, nat0)
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, c3)
  eqeq12d(co(cv(hs0), c2, nat1), cfv(c4, cv(hs0)), co(c0, c2, nat1), cfv(c4, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c0, c2, nat1)
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wceq(co(c0, c2, nat0), cfv(c3, c0)), wceq(co(c0, c2, nat1), cfv(c4, c0))))
}

thm htpyi(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {

} = {

  rspccva(hs0, c1, c0, ((hs0[c2]0)=(c3 ` hs0)‚àß(hs0[c2]1)=(c4 ` hs0)), ((c0[c2]0)=(c3 ` c0)‚àß(c0[c2]1)=(c4 ` c0)))
  anbi12d(hs0 = c0, (hs0[c2]0)=(c3 ` hs0), (hs0[c2]1)=(c4 ` hs0), (c0[c2]0)=(c3 ` c0), (c0[c2]1)=(c4 ` c0))
  eqeq12d((hs0[c2]0), (c3 ` hs0), (c0[c2]0), (c3 ` c0), hs0 = c0)

  fveq2(hs0, c0, c3)

blocks.name: ishtpyd
blocks.content: Deduction for membership in the class of homotopies. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Feb-2015.)

thm ishtpyd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, co(c2, chtpy, c3), c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c5)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, co(c2, ccn, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(co(c2, ctx, cii), ccn, c3)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, nat0), cfv(c1, cv(s0))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, nat1), cfv(c4, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpbir2and(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, co(c2, chtpy, c3), c4)), wcel(c0, co(co(c2, ctx, cii), ccn, c3)), wral(s0, c5, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, nat0), cfv(c1, cv(s0))), wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, nat1), cfv(c4, cv(s0))))))
  ralrimiva(s0, c5, w0, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, nat0), cfv(c1, cv(s0))), wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, nat1), cfv(c4, cv(s0)))))
  jca(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, nat0), cfv(c1, cv(s0))), wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, nat1), cfv(c4, cv(s0))))
  ishtpy(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)
}

blocks.name: htpycom
blocks.content: Given a homotopy from ` F ` to ` G ` , produce a homotopy from ` G ` to ` F ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm htpycom(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, co(c2, chtpy, c3), c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c5)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, co(c2, ccn, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, c3)))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpo(s0, s1, c5, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), co(cv(s0), c6, co(nat1, cmin, cv(s1)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, co(c4, co(c2, chtpy, c3), c1)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  ishtpyd(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  syl5eqel(c0, co(co(c2, ctx, cii), ccn, c3), cmpo(s0, s1, c5, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), co(cv(s0), c6, co(nat1, cmin, cv(s1)))), w0)
  cnmpt22f(s0, s1, c5, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cv(s0), c6, co(nat1, cmin, cv(s1)), c2, cii, c3, c2, cii, w0)
  cnmpt1st(s0, s1, c5, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), c2, cii, w0)
  cnmpt21(s0, s1, hs1, c5, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), co(nat1, cmin, cv(s1)), c2, cii, cii, cv(s1), cii, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs1)), w0)
  cnmpt2nd(s0, s1, c5, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), c2, cii, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(cii, cfv(ctopon, co(nat0, cicc, nat1))))
  iitopon()
  a1i(w0, wcel(cmpt(hs1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs1))), co(cii, ccn, cii)))
  iirevcn(hs1)
  oveq2(cv(hs1), cv(s1), nat1, cmin)
  sseldd(c6, co(co(c2, ctx, cii), ccn, c3), co(c4, co(c2, chtpy, c3), c1), w0)
  htpycn(c4, c2, c3, c1, c5, w0)
  eqtrd(co(cv(hs0), c0, nat0), cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs0), c6, nat1), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5)))
  sylancl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, nat0), co(cv(hs0), c6, nat1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c5), wcel(nat0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)))
  0elunit()
  ovmpt2(s0, s1, cv(hs0), c5, nat0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), c0, co(cv(hs0), c6, nat1), co(cv(s0), c6, co(nat1, cmin, cv(s1))), co(cv(hs0), c6, co(nat1, cmin, cv(s1))))
  oveq2d(cv(hs0), c6, co(nat1, cmin, cv(s1)), nat1, wceq(cv(s1), nat0))
  syl6eq(co(nat1, cmin, cv(s1)), nat1, co(nat1, cmin, nat0), wceq(cv(s1), nat0))
  oveq2(cv(s1), nat0, nat1, cmin)
  1m0e1()
  ovex(cv(hs0), c6, nat1)
  simprd(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c6, nat1), cfv(c1, cv(hs0))), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c6, nat0), cfv(c4, cv(hs0))))
  eqtrd(co(cv(hs0), c0, nat1), cfv(c4, cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs0), c6, nat0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5)))
  sylancl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, nat1), co(cv(hs0), c6, nat0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c5), wcel(nat1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5))
  1elunit()
  ovmpt2(s0, s1, cv(hs0), c5, nat1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), c0, co(cv(hs0), c6, nat0), co(cv(s0), c6, co(nat1, cmin, cv(s1))), co(cv(hs0), c6, co(nat1, cmin, cv(s1))))
  oveq1(cv(s0), cv(hs0), c6, co(nat1, cmin, cv(s1)))
  oveq2d(cv(hs0), c6, co(nat1, cmin, cv(s1)), nat0, wceq(cv(s1), nat1))
  syl6eq(co(nat1, cmin, cv(s1)), nat0, co(nat1, cmin, nat1), wceq(cv(s1), nat1))
  oveq2(cv(s1), nat1, nat1, cmin)
  1m1e0()
  ovex(cv(hs0), c6, nat0)
  simpld(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c6, nat0), cfv(c4, cv(hs0))), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c6, nat1), cfv(c1, cv(hs0))))
  htpyi(cv(hs0), c5, c6, c4, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)

  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s1, nat1, cmin, cv(hs1))
  diff.cmin.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.hs1.c(c5)
  diff.hs1.c(co(nat0, cicc, nat1))
  diff.hs1.c(co(nat1, cmin, cv(s1)))
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(cii)
  diff.hs1.c(cv(s1))
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.co.s(s0, cv(hs0), c6, nat1)
  diff.co.s(s1, cv(hs0), c6, nat1)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, cv(hs0), c6, nat0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, cv(hs0), c6, nat0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.nat0.s(s1)
}

thm htpycom(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà(c1[(c2[Htpy]c3)]c4))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` c5))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà(c2[Cn]c3))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà(c2[Cn]c3))
  ‚ä£ c0 =(s0 ‚àà c5, s1 ‚àà(0[[,]]1)‚Ü¶(s0[c6](1[-]s1)))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c6 ‚àà(c4[(c2[Htpy]c3)]c1))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c6)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c6)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  ishtpyd(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  syl5eqel(c0, ((c2[tX]II)[Cn]c3), (s0 ‚àà c5, s1 ‚àà(0[[,]]1)‚Ü¶(s0[c6](1[-]s1))), w0)
  cnmpt22f(s0, s1, c5, (0[[,]]1), s0, c6, (1[-]s1), c2, cii, c3, c2, cii, w0)
  cnmpt1st(s0, s1, c5, (0[[,]]1), c2, cii, w0)
  cnmpt21(s0, s1, hs1, c5, (0[[,]]1), (1[-]s1), c2, cii, cii, s1, cii, (0[[,]]1), (1[-]hs1), w0)
  cnmpt2nd(s0, s1, c5, (0[[,]]1), c2, cii, w0)
  a1i(w0, II ‚àà(TopOn `(0[[,]]1)))
  iitopon()
  a1i(w0, (hs1 ‚àà(0[[,]]1)‚Ü¶(1[-]hs1))‚àà(II[Cn]II))
  iirevcn(hs1)
  oveq2(hs1, s1, nat1, cmin)
  sseldd(c6, ((c2[tX]II)[Cn]c3), (c4[(c2[Htpy]c3)]c1), w0)
  htpycn(c4, c2, c3, c1, c5, w0)
  eqtrd((hs0[c0]0), (c1 ` hs0), (hs0[c6]1), (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c5))
  sylancl((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c5), (hs0[c0]0)=(hs0[c6]1), hs0 ‚àà c5, 0 ‚àà(0[[,]]1))
  0elunit()
  ovmpt2(s0, s1, hs0, c5, nat0, (0[[,]]1), c0, (hs0[c6]1), (s0[c6](1[-]s1)), (hs0[c6](1[-]s1)))
  oveq2d(hs0, c6, (1[-]s1), nat1, s1 = 0)
  syl6eq((1[-]s1), nat1, (1[-]0), s1 = 0)
  oveq2(s1, nat0, nat1, cmin)
  1m0e1()
  ovex(hs0, c6, nat1)
  simprd((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c5), (hs0[c6]1)=(c1 ` hs0), (hs0[c6]0)=(c4 ` hs0))
  eqtrd((hs0[c0]1), (c4 ` hs0), (hs0[c6]0), (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c5))
  sylancl((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c5), (hs0[c0]1)=(hs0[c6]0), hs0 ‚àà c5, 1 ‚àà(0[[,]]1))
  simpr(w0, hs0 ‚àà c5)
  1elunit()
  ovmpt2(s0, s1, hs0, c5, nat1, (0[[,]]1), c0, (hs0[c6]0), (s0[c6](1[-]s1)), (hs0[c6](1[-]s1)))
  oveq1(s0, hs0, c6, (1[-]s1))
  oveq2d(hs0, c6, (1[-]s1), nat0, s1 = 1)
  syl6eq((1[-]s1), nat0, (1[-]1), s1 = 1)
  oveq2(s1, nat1, nat1, cmin)
  1m1e0()
  ovex(hs0, c6, nat0)
  simpld((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c5), (hs0[c6]0)=(c4 ` hs0), (hs0[c6]1)=(c1 ` hs0))
  htpyi(hs0, c5, c6, c4, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cicc, nat1)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diff.cii.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s1, nat0, cicc, nat1)
  diff.cicc.s(s1)
  diff.cii.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat1, cmin, hs1)
  diff.cmin.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s1, nat1, cmin, hs1)
  diff.cmin.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.hs1.c(c5)
  diff.hs1.c((0[[,]]1))
  diff.hs1.c((1[-]s1))
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(cii)
  diff.hs1.c(s1)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.co.s(s0, hs0, c6, nat1)
  diff.co.s(s1, hs0, c6, nat1)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, hs0, c6, nat0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, hs0, c6, nat0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.nat0.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: htpyid
blocks.content: A homotopy from a function to itself. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm htpyid(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, co(c2, chtpy, c3), c1)))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpo(s0, s1, c4, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cfv(c1, cv(s0))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, c3)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  ishtpyd(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c1, c4, w0)
  syl5eqel(c0, co(co(c2, ctx, cii), ccn, c3), cmpo(s0, s1, c4, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cfv(c1, cv(s0))), w0)
  cnmpt21f(s0, s1, c4, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), c1, cv(s0), c2, cii, c3, c2, w0)
  cnmpt1st(s0, s1, c4, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), c2, cii, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(cii, cfv(ctopon, co(nat0, cicc, nat1))))
  iitopon()
  sylancl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, nat0), cfv(c1, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(nat0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)))
  0elunit()
  ovmpt2(s0, s1, cv(hs0), c4, nat0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), c0, cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(c1, cv(hs0)))
  eqidd(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s1), nat0))
  sylancl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, nat1), cfv(c1, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(nat1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4))
  1elunit()
  ovmpt2(s0, s1, cv(hs0), c4, nat1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), c0, cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(c1, cv(hs0)))
  fveq2(cv(s0), cv(hs0), c1)
  eqidd(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s1), nat1))
  fvex(c1, cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cicc, nat1)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s1, nat0, cicc, nat1)
  diff.cicc.s(s1)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c1, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.nat0.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c1, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
}

thm htpyid(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà(c1[(c2[Htpy]c3)]c1))
  ‚ä£ c0 =(s0 ‚àà c4, s1 ‚àà(0[[,]]1)‚Ü¶(c1 ` s0))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` c4))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà(c2[Cn]c3))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  ishtpyd(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c1, c4, w0)
  syl5eqel(c0, ((c2[tX]II)[Cn]c3), (s0 ‚àà c4, s1 ‚àà(0[[,]]1)‚Ü¶(c1 ` s0)), w0)
  cnmpt21f(s0, s1, c4, (0[[,]]1), c1, s0, c2, cii, c3, c2, w0)
  cnmpt1st(s0, s1, c4, (0[[,]]1), c2, cii, w0)
  a1i(w0, II ‚àà(TopOn `(0[[,]]1)))
  iitopon()
  sylancl((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c4), (hs0[c0]0)=(c1 ` hs0), hs0 ‚àà c4, 0 ‚àà(0[[,]]1))
  0elunit()
  ovmpt2(s0, s1, hs0, c4, nat0, (0[[,]]1), c0, (c1 ` hs0), (c1 ` s0), (c1 ` hs0))
  eqidd((c1 ` hs0), s1 = 0)
  sylancl((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c4), (hs0[c0]1)=(c1 ` hs0), hs0 ‚àà c4, 1 ‚àà(0[[,]]1))
  simpr(w0, hs0 ‚àà c4)
  1elunit()
  ovmpt2(s0, s1, hs0, c4, nat1, (0[[,]]1), c0, (c1 ` hs0), (c1 ` s0), (c1 ` hs0))
  fveq2(s0, hs0, c1)
  eqidd((c1 ` hs0), s1 = 1)
  fvex(c1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cicc, nat1)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s1, nat0, cicc, nat1)
  diff.cicc.s(s1)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.nat0.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: htpyco1
blocks.content: Compose a homotopy with a continuous map. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm htpyco1(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(ccom(c1, c2), co(c3, chtpy, c4), ccom(c5, c2))))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpo(s0, s1, c6, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c7, cv(s1))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(ctopon, c6)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, co(c3, ccn, c8)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, co(c8, ccn, c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, co(c8, ccn, c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c7, co(c1, co(c8, chtpy, c4), c5)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)
  -| diffsc(s0, c8)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c7)
  -| diffsc(s1, c8)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  ishtpyd(hs0, c0, ccom(c1, c2), c3, c4, ccom(c5, c2), c6, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(ccom(c1, c2), co(c3, ccn, c4)), wcel(c2, co(c3, ccn, c8)), wcel(c1, co(c8, ccn, c4)))
  cnco(c2, c3, c8, c1, c4)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(ccom(c5, c2), co(c3, ccn, c4)), wcel(c2, co(c3, ccn, c8)), wcel(c5, co(c8, ccn, c4)))
  cnco(c2, c3, c8, c5, c4)
  syl5eqel(c0, co(co(c3, ctx, cii), ccn, c4), cmpo(s0, s1, c6, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c7, cv(s1))), w0)
  cnmpt22f(s0, s1, c6, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c7, cv(s1), c3, cii, c4, c8, cii, w0)
  cnmpt21f(s0, s1, c6, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), c2, cv(s0), c3, cii, c8, c3, w0)
  cnmpt1st(s0, s1, c6, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), c3, cii, w0)
  cnmpt2nd(s0, s1, c6, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), c3, cii, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(cii, cfv(ctopon, co(nat0, cicc, nat1))))
  iitopon()
  sseldd(c7, co(co(c8, ctx, cii), ccn, c4), co(c1, co(c8, chtpy, c4), c5), w0)
  htpycn(c1, c8, c4, c5, cuni(c8), w0)
  3eqtr4d(co(cv(hs0), c0, nat0), cfv(ccom(c1, c2), cv(hs0)), co(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c7, nat0), cfv(c1, cfv(c2, cv(hs0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c6)))
  simpld(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c6)), wceq(co(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c7, nat0), cfv(c1, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))), wceq(co(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c7, nat1), cfv(c5, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))))
  sylancl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c6)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, nat0), co(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c7, nat0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c6), wcel(nat0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)))
  0elunit()
  ovmpt2a(s0, s1, cv(hs0), c6, nat0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), c0, co(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c7, nat0), co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c7, cv(s1)))
  oveqan12d(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c7, cv(s1), cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), nat0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s1), nat0))
  id(wceq(cv(s1), nat0))
  ovex(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c7, nat0)
  sylan(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c6), wceq(cfv(ccom(c1, c2), cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))), wf(c2, c6, cuni(c8)))
  fvco3(c2, c6, cuni(c8), cv(hs0), c1)
  3eqtr4d(co(cv(hs0), c0, nat1), cfv(ccom(c5, c2), cv(hs0)), co(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c7, nat1), cfv(c5, cfv(c2, cv(hs0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c6)))
  simprd(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c6)), wceq(co(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c7, nat1), cfv(c5, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))), wceq(co(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c7, nat0), cfv(c1, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))))
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c6), wa(wceq(co(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c7, nat0), cfv(c1, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))), wceq(co(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c7, nat1), cfv(c5, cfv(c2, cv(hs0))))), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cuni(c8)))
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs0), c6, c2, cuni(c8), w0)
  htpyi(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cuni(c8), c7, c1, c5, c8, c4, w0)
  sylancl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c6)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c0, nat1), co(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c7, nat1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c6), wcel(nat1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c6))
  1elunit()
  ovmpt2a(s0, s1, cv(hs0), c6, nat1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), c0, co(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c7, nat1), co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c7, cv(s1)))
  oveqan12d(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c7, cv(s1), cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), nat1, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s1), nat1))
  fveq2(cv(s0), cv(hs0), c2)
  id(wceq(cv(s1), nat1))
  ovex(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c7, nat1)
  sylan(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c6), wceq(cfv(ccom(c5, c2), cv(hs0)), cfv(c5, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))), wf(c2, c6, cuni(c8)))
  syl3anc(w0, wf(c2, c6, cuni(c8)), wcel(c3, cfv(ctopon, c6)), wcel(c8, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c8))), wcel(c2, co(c3, ccn, c8)))
  sylib(w0, wcel(c8, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c8))), wcel(c8, ctop))
  syl(w0, wcel(c8, ctop), wcel(c2, co(c3, ccn, c8)))
  cntop2(c2, c3, c8)
  toptopon2(c8)
  cnf2(c3, c6, c8, cuni(c8), c2)
  fvco3(c2, c6, cuni(c8), cv(hs0), c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(ccom(c1, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(ccom(c5, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c6)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cicc, nat1)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diff.cii.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s1, nat0, cicc, nat1)
  diff.cicc.s(s1)
  diff.cii.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s0, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c7, nat0)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s1, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c7, nat0)
  diff.nat0.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s0, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c7, nat1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c2, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s1, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c7, nat1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c2, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
}

thm htpyco2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(ccom(c0, c1), co(ccom(c0, c2), co(c3, chtpy, c4), ccom(c0, c5))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, co(c3, ccn, c6)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, co(c3, ccn, c6)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c6, ccn, c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, co(c2, co(c3, chtpy, c6), c5)))
} = {
  ishtpyd(hs0, ccom(c0, c1), ccom(c0, c2), c3, c4, ccom(c0, c5), cuni(c3), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(ccom(c0, c2), co(c3, ccn, c4)), wcel(c2, co(c3, ccn, c6)), wcel(c0, co(c6, ccn, c4)))
  cnco(c2, c3, c6, c0, c4)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(ccom(c0, c5), co(c3, ccn, c4)), wcel(c5, co(c3, ccn, c6)), wcel(c0, co(c6, ccn, c4)))
  cnco(c5, c3, c6, c0, c4)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(ccom(c0, c1), co(co(c3, ctx, cii), ccn, c4)), wcel(c1, co(co(c3, ctx, cii), ccn, c6)), wcel(c0, co(c6, ccn, c4)))
  cnco(c1, co(c3, ctx, cii), c6, c0, c4)
  3eqtr4d(co(cv(hs0), ccom(c0, c1), nat0), cfv(ccom(c0, c2), cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), c1, nat0)), cfv(c0, cfv(c2, cv(hs0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(c3))))
  fveq2d(c0, co(cv(hs0), c1, nat0), cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(c3))))
  simpld(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(c3))), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, nat0), cfv(c2, cv(hs0))), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, nat1), cfv(c5, cv(hs0))))
  3eqtr4g(co(cv(hs0), ccom(c0, c1), nat0), cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), c1, nat0)), cfv(ccom(c0, c1), cop(cv(hs0), nat0)), cfv(c0, cfv(c1, cop(cv(hs0), nat0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(c3))))
  syl2an2r(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(c3)), wceq(cfv(ccom(c0, c1), cop(cv(hs0), nat0)), cfv(c0, cfv(c1, cop(cv(hs0), nat0)))), wf(c1, cxp(cuni(c3), co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), cuni(c6)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), nat0), cxp(cuni(c3), co(nat0, cicc, nat1))))
  sylancl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(c3))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), nat0), cxp(cuni(c3), co(nat0, cicc, nat1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(c3)), wcel(nat0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)))
  0elunit()
  opelxpi(cv(hs0), cuni(c3), nat0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1))
  fvco3(c1, cxp(cuni(c3), co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), cuni(c6), cop(cv(hs0), nat0), c0)
  df-ov(cv(hs0), ccom(c0, c1), nat0)
  fveq2i(c0, co(cv(hs0), c1, nat0), cfv(c1, cop(cv(hs0), nat0)))
  df-ov(cv(hs0), c1, nat0)
  sylan(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(c3)), wceq(cfv(ccom(c0, c2), cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))), wf(c2, cuni(c3), cuni(c6)))
  syl(w0, wf(c2, cuni(c3), cuni(c6)), wcel(c2, co(c3, ccn, c6)))
  cnf(c2, c3, c6, cuni(c3), cuni(c6))
  fvco3(c2, cuni(c3), cuni(c6), cv(hs0), c0)
  3eqtr4d(co(cv(hs0), ccom(c0, c1), nat1), cfv(ccom(c0, c5), cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), c1, nat1)), cfv(c0, cfv(c5, cv(hs0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(c3))))
  fveq2d(c0, co(cv(hs0), c1, nat1), cfv(c5, cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(c3))))
  simprd(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(c3))), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, nat1), cfv(c5, cv(hs0))), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, nat0), cfv(c2, cv(hs0))))
  htpyi(cv(hs0), cuni(c3), c1, c2, c5, c3, c6, w0)
  3eqtr4g(co(cv(hs0), ccom(c0, c1), nat1), cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), c1, nat1)), cfv(ccom(c0, c1), cop(cv(hs0), nat1)), cfv(c0, cfv(c1, cop(cv(hs0), nat1))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(c3))))
  syl2an2r(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(c3)), wceq(cfv(ccom(c0, c1), cop(cv(hs0), nat1)), cfv(c0, cfv(c1, cop(cv(hs0), nat1)))), wf(c1, cxp(cuni(c3), co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), cuni(c6)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), nat1), cxp(cuni(c3), co(nat0, cicc, nat1))))
  syl3anc(w0, wf(c1, cxp(cuni(c3), co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), cuni(c6)), wcel(co(c3, ctx, cii), cfv(ctopon, cxp(cuni(c3), co(nat0, cicc, nat1)))), wcel(c6, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c6))), wcel(c1, co(co(c3, ctx, cii), ccn, c6)))
  sylancl(w0, wcel(co(c3, ctx, cii), cfv(ctopon, cxp(cuni(c3), co(nat0, cicc, nat1)))), wcel(c3, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c3))), wcel(cii, cfv(ctopon, co(nat0, cicc, nat1))))
  iitopon()
  txtopon(c3, cuni(c3), cii, co(nat0, cicc, nat1))
  sylib(w0, wcel(c6, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c6))), wcel(c6, ctop))
  syl(w0, wcel(c6, ctop), wcel(c2, co(c3, ccn, c6)))
  cntop2(c2, c3, c6)
  toptopon2(c6)
  sseldd(c1, co(co(c3, ctx, cii), ccn, c6), co(c2, co(c3, chtpy, c6), c5), w0)
  htpycn(c2, c3, c6, c5, cuni(c3), w0)
  sylib(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c3))), wcel(c3, ctop))
  syl(w0, wcel(c3, ctop), wcel(c2, co(c3, ccn, c6)))
  cntop1(c2, c3, c6)
  toptopon2(c3)
  cnf2(co(c3, ctx, cii), cxp(cuni(c3), co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), c6, cuni(c6), c1)
  sylancl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(c3))), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), nat1), cxp(cuni(c3), co(nat0, cicc, nat1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(c3)), wcel(nat1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(c3)))
  1elunit()
  opelxpi(cv(hs0), cuni(c3), nat1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1))
  fvco3(c1, cxp(cuni(c3), co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), cuni(c6), cop(cv(hs0), nat1), c0)
  df-ov(cv(hs0), ccom(c0, c1), nat1)
  fveq2i(c0, co(cv(hs0), c1, nat1), cfv(c1, cop(cv(hs0), nat1)))
  df-ov(cv(hs0), c1, nat1)
  sylan(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(c3)), wceq(cfv(ccom(c0, c5), cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, cfv(c5, cv(hs0)))), wf(c5, cuni(c3), cuni(c6)))
  syl(w0, wf(c5, cuni(c3), cuni(c6)), wcel(c5, co(c3, ccn, c6)))
  cnf(c5, c3, c6, cuni(c3), cuni(c6))
  eqid(cuni(c3))
  eqid(cuni(c6))
  fvco3(c5, cuni(c3), cuni(c6), cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.hs0.c(ccom(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(ccom(c0, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(ccom(c0, c5))
  diff.hs0.c(cuni(c3))

thm htpyco2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ‚àò c1)‚àà((c0 ‚àò c2)[(c3[Htpy]c4)](c0 ‚àò c5)))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà(c3[Cn]c6))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c5 ‚àà(c3[Cn]c6))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà(c6[Cn]c4))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà(c2[(c3[Htpy]c6)]c5))

  cnco(c1, (c3[tX]II), c6, c0, c4)
  3eqtr4d((hs0[(c0 ‚àò c1)]0), ((c0 ‚àò c2)` hs0), (c0 `(hs0[c1]0)), (c0 `(c2 ` hs0)), (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ c3))

  0elunit()
  opelxpi(hs0, ‚ãÉ c3, nat0, (0[[,]]1))

  df-ov(hs0, (c0 ‚àò c1), nat0)
  fveq2i(c0, (hs0[c1]0), (c1 ` < hs0, 0 >))
  df-ov(hs0, c1, nat0)
  sylan(w0, hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ c3, ((c0 ‚àò c2)` hs0)=(c0 `(c2 ` hs0)), (c2 : ‚ãÉ c3 ‚Üí ‚ãÉ c6))
  syl(w0, (c2 : ‚ãÉ c3 ‚Üí ‚ãÉ c6), c2 ‚àà(c3[Cn]c6))
  cnf(c2, c3, c6, ‚ãÉ c3, ‚ãÉ c6)
  fvco3(c2, ‚ãÉ c3, ‚ãÉ c6, hs0, c0)
  3eqtr4d((hs0[(c0 ‚àò c1)]1), ((c0 ‚àò c5)` hs0), (c0 `(hs0[c1]1)), (c0 `(c5 ` hs0)), (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ c3))

blocks.name: htpycc
blocks.content: Concatenate two homotopies. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Feb-2015.)

blocks.name: isphtpy
blocks.content: Membership in the class of path homotopies between two continuous functions. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Feb-2015.)

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, co(cii, ccn, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, co(cii, ccn, c2)))

  a1ii(wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, cfv(cphtpy, c2), c3)), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, co(cii, chtpy, c2), c3)), wral(s0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), wa(wceq(co(nat0, c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c1, nat0)), wceq(co(nat1, c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c1, nat1))))))), diffsc(s0, c2))

  ovex(cii, ccn, c2)
  adantl(w0, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs2), c3)), wceq(crab(hs0, co(cv(hs1), co(cii, chtpy, c2), cv(hs2)), wral(s0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), wa(wceq(co(nat0, cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cfv(cv(hs1), nat0)), wceq(co(nat1, cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cfv(cv(hs1), nat1))))), crab(hs0, co(c1, co(cii, chtpy, c2), c3), wral(s0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), wa(wceq(co(nat0, cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cfv(c1, nat0)), wceq(co(nat1, cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cfv(c1, nat1)))))))

  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí(c0 ‚àà(c1[(PHtpy ` c2)]c3)‚Üî(c0 ‚àà(c1[(II[Htpy]c2)]c3)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(0[[,]]1),((0[c0]s0)=(c1 ` 0)‚àß(1[c0]s0)=(c1 ` 1)))))), d(s0, c2))

  syl6bb(w0, c0 ‚àà(c1[(PHtpy ` c2)]c3), (c0 ‚àà(c1[(II[Htpy]c2)]c3)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(0[[,]]1),((0[c0]s0)=(c1 ` 0)‚àß(1[c0]s0)=(c1 ` 1)))), c0 ‚àà { hs0 ‚àà(c1[(II[Htpy]c2)]c3)| ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(0[[,]]1),((0[hs0]s0)=(c1 ` 0)‚àß(1[hs0]s0)=(c1 ` 1)))})
  eleq2d(c0, (c1[(PHtpy ` c2)]c3), { hs0 ‚àà(c1[(II[Htpy]c2)]c3)| ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(0[[,]]1),((0[hs0]s0)=(c1 ` 0)‚àß(1[hs0]s0)=(c1 ` 1)))}, w0)
  ovmpt2d(hs1, hs2, c1, (PHtpy ` c2), c3, { hs0 ‚àà(c1[(II[Htpy]c2)]c3)| ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(0[[,]]1),((0[hs0]s0)=(c1 ` 0)‚àß(1[hs0]s0)=(c1 ` 1)))}, (II[Cn]c2), (II[Cn]c2), { hs0 ‚àà(hs1[(II[Htpy]c2)]hs2)| ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(0[[,]]1),((0[hs0]s0)=(hs1 ` 0)‚àß(1[hs0]s0)=(hs1 ` 1)))}, universe, w0)
  3syl(w0, (PHtpy ` c2)=(hs1 ‚àà(II[Cn]c2), hs2 ‚àà(II[Cn]c2)‚Ü¶ { hs0 ‚àà(hs1[(II[Htpy]c2)]hs2)| ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(0[[,]]1),((0[hs0]s0)=(hs1 ` 0)‚àß(1[hs0]s0)=(hs1 ` 1)))}), c1 ‚àà(II[Cn]c2), c2 ‚àà Top)
  cntop2(c1, cii, c2)
  fvmpt(hs3, c2, ctop, cphtpy, (hs1 ‚àà(II[Cn]c2), hs2 ‚àà(II[Cn]c2)‚Ü¶ { hs0 ‚àà(hs1[(II[Htpy]c2)]hs2)| ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(0[[,]]1),((0[hs0]s0)=(hs1 ` 0)‚àß(1[hs0]s0)=(hs1 ` 1)))}), (hs1 ‚àà(II[Cn]hs3), hs2 ‚àà(II[Cn]hs3)‚Ü¶ { hs0 ‚àà(hs1[(II[Htpy]hs3)]hs2)| ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(0[[,]]1),((0[hs0]s0)=(hs1 ` 0)‚àß(1[hs0]s0)=(hs1 ` 1)))}))
  mpoeq123dv(hs1, hs2, (II[Cn]hs3), (II[Cn]hs3), { hs0 ‚àà(hs1[(II[Htpy]hs3)]hs2)| ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(0[[,]]1),((0[hs0]s0)=(hs1 ` 0)‚àß(1[hs0]s0)=(hs1 ` 1)))}, (II[Cn]c2), (II[Cn]c2), { hs0 ‚àà(hs1[(II[Htpy]c2)]hs2)| ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(0[[,]]1),((0[hs0]s0)=(hs1 ` 0)‚àß(1[hs0]s0)=(hs1 ` 1)))}, hs3 = c2)

  oveqd(hs1, (II[Htpy]hs3), hs2, (II[Htpy]c2), hs3 = c2)

  df-phtpy(hs3, hs1, hs2, hs0, s0)
  mpt2ex(hs1, hs2, (II[Cn]c2), (II[Cn]c2), { hs0 ‚àà(hs1[(II[Htpy]c2)]hs2)| ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(0[[,]]1),((0[hs0]s0)=(hs1 ` 0)‚àß(1[hs0]s0)=(hs1 ` 1)))})
  ovex(cii, ccn, c2)
  adantl(w0, (hs1 = c1 ‚àß hs2 = c3), { hs0 ‚àà(hs1[(II[Htpy]c2)]hs2)| ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(0[[,]]1),((0[hs0]s0)=(hs1 ` 0)‚àß(1[hs0]s0)=(hs1 ` 1)))} = { hs0 ‚àà(c1[(II[Htpy]c2)]c3)| ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(0[[,]]1),((0[hs0]s0)=(c1 ` 0)‚àß(1[hs0]s0)=(c1 ` 1)))})
  rabeqbidv(hs0, (hs1[(II[Htpy]c2)]hs2), (c1[(II[Htpy]c2)]c3), (hs1 = c1 ‚àß hs2 = c3), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(0[[,]]1),((0[hs0]s0)=(hs1 ` 0)‚àß(1[hs0]s0)=(hs1 ` 1))), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(0[[,]]1),((0[hs0]s0)=(c1 ` 0)‚àß(1[hs0]s0)=(c1 ` 1))))
  oveq12(hs1, c1, hs2, c3, (II[Htpy]c2))
  ralbidv(s0, (0[[,]]1), (hs1 = c1 ‚àß hs2 = c3), ((0[hs0]s0)=(hs1 ` 0)‚àß(1[hs0]s0)=(hs1 ` 1)), ((0[hs0]s0)=(c1 ` 0)‚àß(1[hs0]s0)=(c1 ` 1)))
  anbi12d((hs1 = c1 ‚àß hs2 = c3), (0[hs0]s0)=(hs1 ` 0), (1[hs0]s0)=(hs1 ` 1), (0[hs0]s0)=(c1 ` 0), (1[hs0]s0)=(c1 ` 1))
  eqeq2d((0[hs0]s0), (hs1 ` 0), (c1 ` 0), (hs1 = c1 ‚àß hs2 = c3))
  fveq1d(hs1, nat0, c1, (hs1 = c1 ‚àß hs2 = c3))
  eqeq2d((1[hs0]s0), (hs1 ` 1), (c1 ` 1), (hs1 = c1 ‚àß hs2 = c3))
  fveq1d(hs1, nat1, c1, (hs1 = c1 ‚àß hs2 = c3))
  simpl(hs1 = c1, hs2 = c3)
  a1i(w0, { hs0 ‚àà(c1[(II[Htpy]c2)]c3)| ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(0[[,]]1),((0[hs0]s0)=(c1 ` 0)‚àß(1[hs0]s0)=(c1 ` 1)))} ‚àà ùïå)
  rabex(hs0, (c1[(II[Htpy]c2)]c3), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(0[[,]]1),((0[hs0]s0)=(c1 ` 0)‚àß(1[hs0]s0)=(c1 ` 1))))
  ovex(c1, (II[Htpy]c2), c3)
  elrab(hs0, c0, (c1[(II[Htpy]c2)]c3), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(0[[,]]1),((0[hs0]s0)=(c1 ` 0)‚àß(1[hs0]s0)=(c1 ` 1))), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(0[[,]]1),((0[c0]s0)=(c1 ` 0)‚àß(1[c0]s0)=(c1 ` 1))))
  ralbidv(s0, (0[[,]]1), hs0 = c0, ((0[hs0]s0)=(c1 ` 0)‚àß(1[hs0]s0)=(c1 ` 1)), ((0[c0]s0)=(c1 ` 0)‚àß(1[c0]s0)=(c1 ` 1)))
  anbi12d(hs0 = c0, (0[hs0]s0)=(c1 ` 0), (1[hs0]s0)=(c1 ` 1), (0[c0]s0)=(c1 ` 0), (1[c0]s0)=(c1 ` 1))
  eqeq1d((0[hs0]s0), (c1 ` 0), (0[c0]s0), hs0 = c0)
  oveq(hs0, c0, nat0, s0)
  eqeq1d((1[hs0]s0), (c1 ` 1), (1[c0]s0), hs0 = c0)

  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c({ hs0 ‚àà(c1[(II[Htpy]c2)]c3)| ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(0[[,]]1),((0[hs0]s0)=(c1 ` 0)‚àß(1[hs0]s0)=(c1 ` 1)))})
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c3)
  diff.hs2.c({ hs0 ‚àà(c1[(II[Htpy]c2)]c3)| ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(0[[,]]1),((0[hs0]s0)=(c1 ` 0)‚àß(1[hs0]s0)=(c1 ` 1)))})
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs2.w(w0)
  diff.hs3.c(c2)
  diff.hs3.c(ctop)

  diff.hs0.c((hs1[(II[Htpy]hs3)]hs2))
  diff.hs0.c((hs1[(II[Htpy]c2)]hs2))
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs3.s(hs1)
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs3.s(hs2)
  diff.hs3.s(hs0)
  diff.hs3.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.c((II[Cn]c2))
  diff.hs2.c((II[Cn]c2))
  diff.hs0.c((c1[(II[Htpy]c2)]c3))
  diff.hs0.w((hs1 = c1 ‚àß hs2 = c3))
  diff.wa.s(s0, hs1 = c1, hs2 = c3)

  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)

blocks.name: phtpyhtpy
blocks.content: A path homotopy is a homotopy. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm phtpyhtpy(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(co(c0, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c2), co(c0, co(cii, chtpy, c1), c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(cii, ccn, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, co(cii, ccn, c1)))
} = {
  ssrdv(hs0, co(c0, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c2), co(c0, co(cii, chtpy, c1), c2), w0)
  syl6bi(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, co(cii, chtpy, c1), c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, co(cii, chtpy, c1), c2)), wral(hs1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), wa(wceq(co(nat0, cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cfv(c0, nat0)), wceq(co(nat1, cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cfv(c0, nat1))))))
  isphtpy(hs1, cv(hs0), c0, c1, c2, w0)
  simpl(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, co(cii, chtpy, c1), c2)), wral(hs1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), wa(wceq(co(nat0, cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cfv(c0, nat0)), wceq(co(nat1, cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cfv(c0, nat1)))))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c2))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, co(cii, chtpy, c1), c2))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
}

thm phtpyhtpy(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[(PHtpy ` c1)]c2)‚äÜ(c0[(II[Htpy]c1)]c2))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà(II[Cn]c1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà(II[Cn]c1))
} = {
  ssrdv(hs0, (c0[(PHtpy ` c1)]c2), (c0[(II[Htpy]c1)]c2), w0)
  syl6bi(w0, hs0 ‚àà(c0[(PHtpy ` c1)]c2), hs0 ‚àà(c0[(II[Htpy]c1)]c2), (hs0 ‚àà(c0[(II[Htpy]c1)]c2)‚àß ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà(0[[,]]1),((0[hs0]hs1)=(c0 ` 0)‚àß(1[hs0]hs1)=(c0 ` 1)))))
  isphtpy(hs1, hs0, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  simpl(hs0 ‚àà(c0[(II[Htpy]c1)]c2), ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà(0[[,]]1),((0[hs0]hs1)=(c0 ` 0)‚àß(1[hs0]hs1)=(c0 ` 1))))
  diff.hs0.c((c0[(PHtpy ` c1)]c2))
  diff.hs0.c((c0[(II[Htpy]c1)]c2))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
}

blocks.name: phtpyi
blocks.content: Membership in the class of path homotopies between two continuous functions. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm phtpyi(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wa(w0, wcel(c0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1))), wa(wceq(co(nat0, c1, c0), cfv(c2, nat0)), wceq(co(nat1, c1, c0), cfv(c2, nat1))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, co(cii, ccn, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, co(cii, ccn, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, co(c2, cfv(cphtpy, c3), c4)))
} = {
  sylan(w0, wcel(c0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wa(wceq(co(nat0, c1, c0), cfv(c2, nat0)), wceq(co(nat1, c1, c0), cfv(c2, nat1))), wral(hs0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), wa(wceq(co(nat0, c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, nat0)), wceq(co(nat1, c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, nat1)))))
  simprd(w0, wral(hs0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), wa(wceq(co(nat0, c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, nat0)), wceq(co(nat1, c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, nat1)))), wcel(c1, co(c2, co(cii, chtpy, c3), c4)))
  mpbid(w0, wa(wcel(c1, co(c2, co(cii, chtpy, c3), c4)), wral(hs0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), wa(wceq(co(nat0, c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, nat0)), wceq(co(nat1, c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, nat1))))), wcel(c1, co(c2, cfv(cphtpy, c3), c4)))
  isphtpy(hs0, c1, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  rspccva(hs0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), c0, wa(wceq(co(nat0, c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, nat0)), wceq(co(nat1, c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, nat1))), wa(wceq(co(nat0, c1, c0), cfv(c2, nat0)), wceq(co(nat1, c1, c0), cfv(c2, nat1))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(co(nat0, c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, nat0)), wceq(co(nat1, c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, nat1)), wceq(co(nat0, c1, c0), cfv(c2, nat0)), wceq(co(nat1, c1, c0), cfv(c2, nat1)))
  eqeq1d(co(nat0, c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, nat0), co(nat0, c1, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c0, nat0, c1)
  eqeq1d(co(nat1, c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, nat1), co(nat1, c1, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c0, nat1, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(co(nat0, cicc, nat1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wceq(co(nat0, c1, c0), cfv(c2, nat0)), wceq(co(nat1, c1, c0), cfv(c2, nat1))))
}

blocks.name: phtpy01
blocks.content: Two path-homotopic paths have the same start and end point. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm phtpy01(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wa(wceq(cfv(c0, nat0), cfv(c1, nat0)), wceq(cfv(c0, nat1), cfv(c1, nat1))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(cii, ccn, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, co(cii, ccn, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, co(c0, cfv(cphtpy, c2), c1)))
} = {
  jca(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, nat0), cfv(c1, nat0)), wceq(cfv(c0, nat1), cfv(c1, nat1)))
  eqtr3d(cfv(c0, nat0), cfv(c1, nat0), co(nat0, c3, nat1), w0)
  simpld(w0, wceq(co(nat0, c3, nat1), cfv(c0, nat0)), wceq(co(nat1, c3, nat1), cfv(c0, nat1)))
  simprd(w0, wceq(co(nat0, c3, nat1), cfv(c1, nat0)), wceq(co(nat0, c3, nat0), cfv(c0, nat0)))
  mpan2(w0, wa(wceq(co(nat0, c3, nat0), cfv(c0, nat0)), wceq(co(nat0, c3, nat1), cfv(c1, nat0))), wcel(nat0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)))
  0elunit()
  htpyi(nat0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), c3, c0, c1, cii, c2, w0)
  eqtr3d(cfv(c0, nat1), cfv(c1, nat1), co(nat1, c3, nat1), w0)
  simprd(w0, wceq(co(nat1, c3, nat1), cfv(c0, nat1)), wceq(co(nat0, c3, nat1), cfv(c0, nat0)))
  mpan2(w0, wa(wceq(co(nat0, c3, nat1), cfv(c0, nat0)), wceq(co(nat1, c3, nat1), cfv(c0, nat1))), wcel(nat1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)))
  phtpyi(nat1, c3, c0, c2, c1, w0)
  simprd(w0, wceq(co(nat1, c3, nat1), cfv(c1, nat1)), wceq(co(nat1, c3, nat0), cfv(c0, nat1)))
  mpan2(w0, wa(wceq(co(nat1, c3, nat0), cfv(c0, nat1)), wceq(co(nat1, c3, nat1), cfv(c1, nat1))), wcel(nat1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)))
  1elunit()
  htpyi(nat1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), c3, c0, c1, cii, c2, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(cii, cfv(ctopon, co(nat0, cicc, nat1))))
  iitopon()
  sseldd(c3, co(c0, co(cii, chtpy, c2), c1), co(c0, cfv(cphtpy, c2), c1), w0)
  phtpyhtpy(c0, c2, c1, w0)
}

blocks.name: isphtpyd
blocks.content: Deduction for membership in the class of path homotopies. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm isphtpyd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, cfv(cphtpy, c2), c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, co(cii, ccn, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, co(cii, ccn, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, co(cii, chtpy, c2), c3)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cicc, nat1))), wceq(co(nat0, c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c1, nat0)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cicc, nat1))), wceq(co(nat1, c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c1, nat1)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpbir2and(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, cfv(cphtpy, c2), c3)), wcel(c0, co(c1, co(cii, chtpy, c2), c3)), wral(s0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), wa(wceq(co(nat0, c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c1, nat0)), wceq(co(nat1, c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c1, nat1)))))
  ralrimiva(s0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), w0, wa(wceq(co(nat0, c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c1, nat0)), wceq(co(nat1, c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c1, nat1))))
  jca(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cicc, nat1))), wceq(co(nat0, c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c1, nat0)), wceq(co(nat1, c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c1, nat1)))
  isphtpy(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
}

blocks.name: isphtpy2d
blocks.content: Deduction for membership in the class of path homotopies. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm isphtpy2d(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, cfv(cphtpy, c2), c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, co(cii, ccn, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, co(cii, ccn, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(co(cii, ctx, cii), ccn, c2)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cicc, nat1))), wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, nat0), cfv(c1, cv(s0))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cicc, nat1))), wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, nat1), cfv(c3, cv(s0))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cicc, nat1))), wceq(co(nat0, c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c1, nat0)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cicc, nat1))), wceq(co(nat1, c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c1, nat1)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  isphtpyd(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  ishtpyd(s0, c0, c1, cii, c2, c3, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(cii, cfv(ctopon, co(nat0, cicc, nat1))))
  iitopon()
  diff.cii.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cicc, nat1)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
}

thm isphtpy2d(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà(c1[(PHtpy ` c2)]c3))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà(II[Cn]c2))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà(II[Cn]c2))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà((II[tX]II)[Cn]c2))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà(0[[,]]1))‚Üí(s0[c0]0)=(c1 ` s0))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà(0[[,]]1))‚Üí(s0[c0]1)=(c3 ` s0))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà(0[[,]]1))‚Üí(0[c0]s0)=(c1 ` 0))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà(0[[,]]1))‚Üí(1[c0]s0)=(c1 ` 1))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  isphtpyd(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  ishtpyd(s0, c0, c1, cii, c2, c3, (0[[,]]1), w0)
  a1i(w0, II ‚àà(TopOn `(0[[,]]1)))
  iitopon()
  diff.cii.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cicc, nat1)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: phtpycom
blocks.content: Given a homotopy from ` F ` to ` G ` , produce a homotopy from ` G ` to ` F ` . (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm phtpycom(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, cfv(cphtpy, c2), c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, co(cii, ccn, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, co(cii, ccn, c2)))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpo(s0, s1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), co(nat0, cicc, nat1), co(cv(s0), c4, co(nat1, cmin, cv(s1)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, co(c3, cfv(cphtpy, c2), c1)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  isphtpyd(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  htpycom(s0, s1, c0, c1, cii, c2, c3, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), c4, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(cii, cfv(ctopon, co(nat0, cicc, nat1))))
  iitopon()
  sseldd(c4, co(c3, co(cii, chtpy, c2), c1), co(c3, cfv(cphtpy, c2), c1), w0)
  phtpyhtpy(c3, c2, c1, w0)
  3eqtrd(co(nat0, c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, nat0), co(nat0, c4, co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs0))), cfv(c3, nat0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cicc, nat1))))
  sylancr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cicc, nat1))), wceq(co(nat0, c0, cv(hs0)), co(nat0, c4, co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs0)))), wcel(nat0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cicc, nat1)))
  0elunit()
  ovmpt2(s0, s1, nat0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cv(hs0), co(nat0, cicc, nat1), c0, co(nat0, c4, co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs0))), co(cv(s0), c4, co(nat1, cmin, cv(s1))), co(nat0, c4, co(nat1, cmin, cv(s1))))
  oveq1(cv(s0), nat0, c4, co(nat1, cmin, cv(s1)))
  oveq2d(nat0, c4, co(nat1, cmin, cv(s1)), co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))
  ovex(nat0, c4, co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs0)))
  simpld(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cicc, nat1))), wceq(co(nat0, c4, co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs0))), cfv(c3, nat0)), wceq(co(nat1, c4, co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs0))), cfv(c3, nat1)))
  simpld(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cicc, nat1))), wceq(cfv(c3, nat0), cfv(c1, nat0)), wceq(cfv(c3, nat1), cfv(c1, nat1)))
  3eqtrd(co(nat1, c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, nat1), co(nat1, c4, co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs0))), cfv(c3, nat1), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cicc, nat1))))
  sylancr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cicc, nat1))), wceq(co(nat1, c0, cv(hs0)), co(nat1, c4, co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs0)))), wcel(nat1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cicc, nat1)))
  1elunit()
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cicc, nat1)))
  ovmpt2(s0, s1, nat1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cv(hs0), co(nat0, cicc, nat1), c0, co(nat1, c4, co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs0))), co(cv(s0), c4, co(nat1, cmin, cv(s1))), co(nat1, c4, co(nat1, cmin, cv(s1))))
  oveq1(cv(s0), nat1, c4, co(nat1, cmin, cv(s1)))
  oveq2d(nat1, c4, co(nat1, cmin, cv(s1)), co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))
  oveq2(cv(s1), cv(hs0), nat1, cmin)
  ovex(nat1, c4, co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs0)))
  simprd(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cicc, nat1))), wceq(co(nat1, c4, co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs0))), cfv(c3, nat1)), wceq(co(nat0, c4, co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs0))), cfv(c3, nat0)))
  sylan2(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wa(wceq(co(nat0, c4, co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs0))), cfv(c3, nat0)), wceq(co(nat1, c4, co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs0))), cfv(c3, nat1))), wcel(co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs0)), co(nat0, cicc, nat1)))
  iirev(cv(hs0))
  phtpyi(co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs0)), c4, c3, c2, c1, w0)
  simprd(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cicc, nat1))), wceq(cfv(c3, nat1), cfv(c1, nat1)), wceq(cfv(c3, nat0), cfv(c1, nat0)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wa(wceq(cfv(c3, nat0), cfv(c1, nat0)), wceq(cfv(c3, nat1), cfv(c1, nat1))))
  phtpy01(c3, c1, c2, c4, w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.cii.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cicc, nat1)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diff.cii.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, nat0, cicc, nat1)
  diff.cicc.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, c4, co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs0)))
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s1, nat0, c4, co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs0)))
  diff.nat0.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat1, c4, co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs0)))
  diff.co.s(s0, nat1, cmin, cv(hs0))
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.cmin.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s1, nat1, c4, co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs0)))
  diff.co.s(s1, nat1, cmin, cv(hs0))
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
  diff.cmin.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

thm phtpycom(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà(c1[(PHtpy ` c2)]c3))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà(II[Cn]c2))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà(II[Cn]c2))
  ‚ä£ c0 =(s0 ‚àà(0[[,]]1), s1 ‚àà(0[[,]]1)‚Ü¶(s0[c4](1[-]s1)))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà(c3[(PHtpy ` c2)]c1))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  isphtpyd(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  htpycom(s0, s1, c0, c1, cii, c2, c3, (0[[,]]1), c4, w0)
  a1i(w0, II ‚àà(TopOn `(0[[,]]1)))
  iitopon()
  sseldd(c4, (c3[(II[Htpy]c2)]c1), (c3[(PHtpy ` c2)]c1), w0)
  phtpyhtpy(c3, c2, c1, w0)
  3eqtrd((0[c0]hs0), (c1 ` 0), (0[c4](1[-]hs0)), (c3 ` 0), (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà(0[[,]]1)))
  sylancr((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà(0[[,]]1)), (0[c0]hs0)=(0[c4](1[-]hs0)), 0 ‚àà(0[[,]]1), hs0 ‚àà(0[[,]]1))
  0elunit()
  ovmpt2(s0, s1, nat0, (0[[,]]1), hs0, (0[[,]]1), c0, (0[c4](1[-]hs0)), (s0[c4](1[-]s1)), (0[c4](1[-]s1)))
  oveq1(s0, nat0, c4, (1[-]s1))
  oveq2d(nat0, c4, (1[-]s1), (1[-]hs0), s1 = hs0)
  ovex(nat0, c4, (1[-]hs0))
  simpld((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà(0[[,]]1)), (0[c4](1[-]hs0))=(c3 ` 0), (1[c4](1[-]hs0))=(c3 ` 1))
  simpld((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà(0[[,]]1)), (c3 ` 0)=(c1 ` 0), (c3 ` 1)=(c1 ` 1))
  3eqtrd((1[c0]hs0), (c1 ` 1), (1[c4](1[-]hs0)), (c3 ` 1), (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà(0[[,]]1)))
  sylancr((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà(0[[,]]1)), (1[c0]hs0)=(1[c4](1[-]hs0)), 1 ‚àà(0[[,]]1), hs0 ‚àà(0[[,]]1))
  1elunit()
  simpr(w0, hs0 ‚àà(0[[,]]1))
  ovmpt2(s0, s1, nat1, (0[[,]]1), hs0, (0[[,]]1), c0, (1[c4](1[-]hs0)), (s0[c4](1[-]s1)), (1[c4](1[-]s1)))
  oveq1(s0, nat1, c4, (1[-]s1))
  oveq2d(nat1, c4, (1[-]s1), (1[-]hs0), s1 = hs0)
  oveq2(s1, hs0, nat1, cmin)
  ovex(nat1, c4, (1[-]hs0))
  simprd((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà(0[[,]]1)), (1[c4](1[-]hs0))=(c3 ` 1), (0[c4](1[-]hs0))=(c3 ` 0))
  sylan2(w0, hs0 ‚àà(0[[,]]1), ((0[c4](1[-]hs0))=(c3 ` 0)‚àß(1[c4](1[-]hs0))=(c3 ` 1)), (1[-]hs0)‚àà(0[[,]]1))
  iirev(hs0)
  phtpyi((1[-]hs0), c4, c3, c2, c1, w0)
  simprd((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà(0[[,]]1)), (c3 ` 1)=(c1 ` 1), (c3 ` 0)=(c1 ` 0))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ‚àà(0[[,]]1), ((c3 ` 0)=(c1 ` 0)‚àß(c3 ` 1)=(c1 ` 1)))
  phtpy01(c3, c1, c2, c4, w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.cii.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cicc, nat1)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diff.cii.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, nat0, cicc, nat1)
  diff.cicc.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, c4, (1[-]hs0))
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s1, nat0, c4, (1[-]hs0))
  diff.nat0.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat1, c4, (1[-]hs0))
  diff.co.s(s0, nat1, cmin, hs0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.cmin.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s1, nat1, c4, (1[-]hs0))
  diff.co.s(s1, nat1, cmin, hs0)
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
  diff.cmin.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: phtpyid
blocks.content: A homotopy from a path to itself. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm phtpyid(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, cfv(cphtpy, c2), c1)))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpo(s0, s1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cfv(c1, cv(s0))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, co(cii, ccn, c2)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  isphtpyd(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c1, w0)
  htpyid(s0, s1, c0, c1, cii, c2, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(cii, cfv(ctopon, co(nat0, cicc, nat1))))
  iitopon()
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wceq(co(nat0, c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, nat0)))
  mpan(wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wceq(co(nat0, c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, nat0)), wcel(nat0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)))
  0elunit()
  ovmpt2(s0, s1, nat0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cv(hs0), co(nat0, cicc, nat1), c0, cfv(c1, nat0), cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(c1, nat0))
  fveq2(cv(s0), nat0, c1)
  eqidd(cfv(c1, nat0), wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))
  fvex(c1, nat0)
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wceq(co(nat1, c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, nat1)))
  mpan(wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), wceq(co(nat1, c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, nat1)), wcel(nat1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)))
  1elunit()
  ovmpt2(s0, s1, nat1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cv(hs0), co(nat0, cicc, nat1), c0, cfv(c1, nat1), cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(c1, nat1))
  fveq2(cv(s0), nat1, c1)
  eqidd(cfv(c1, nat1), wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))
  fvex(c1, nat1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.cii.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cicc, nat1)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diff.cii.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, nat0, cicc, nat1)
  diff.cicc.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c1, nat0)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c1, nat0)
  diff.nat0.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c1, nat1)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c1, nat1)
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
}

thm phtpyid(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà(c1[(PHtpy ` c2)]c1))
  ‚ä£ c0 =(s0 ‚àà(0[[,]]1), s1 ‚àà(0[[,]]1)‚Ü¶(c1 ` s0))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà(II[Cn]c2))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  isphtpyd(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c1, w0)
  htpyid(s0, s1, c0, c1, cii, c2, (0[[,]]1), w0)
  a1i(w0, II ‚àà(TopOn `(0[[,]]1)))
  iitopon()
  adantl(w0, hs0 ‚àà(0[[,]]1), (0[c0]hs0)=(c1 ` 0))
  mpan(hs0 ‚àà(0[[,]]1), (0[c0]hs0)=(c1 ` 0), 0 ‚àà(0[[,]]1))
  0elunit()
  ovmpt2(s0, s1, nat0, (0[[,]]1), hs0, (0[[,]]1), c0, (c1 ` 0), (c1 ` s0), (c1 ` 0))
  fveq2(s0, nat0, c1)
  eqidd((c1 ` 0), s1 = hs0)
  fvex(c1, nat0)
  adantl(w0, hs0 ‚àà(0[[,]]1), (1[c0]hs0)=(c1 ` 1))
  mpan(hs0 ‚àà(0[[,]]1), (1[c0]hs0)=(c1 ` 1), 1 ‚àà(0[[,]]1))
  1elunit()
  ovmpt2(s0, s1, nat1, (0[[,]]1), hs0, (0[[,]]1), c0, (c1 ` 1), (c1 ` s0), (c1 ` 1))
  fveq2(s0, nat1, c1)
  eqidd((c1 ` 1), s1 = hs0)
  fvex(c1, nat1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.cii.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cicc, nat1)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diff.cii.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, nat0, cicc, nat1)
  diff.cicc.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c1, nat0)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c1, nat0)
  diff.nat0.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c1, nat1)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c1, nat1)
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: phtpyco2
blocks.content: Compose a path homotopy with a continuous map. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm phtpyco2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(ccom(c0, c1), co(ccom(c0, c2), cfv(cphtpy, c3), ccom(c0, c4))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, co(cii, ccn, c5)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, co(cii, ccn, c5)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c5, ccn, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, co(c2, cfv(cphtpy, c5), c4)))
} = {
  isphtpyd(hs0, ccom(c0, c1), ccom(c0, c2), c3, ccom(c0, c4), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(ccom(c0, c2), co(cii, ccn, c3)), wcel(c2, co(cii, ccn, c5)), wcel(c0, co(c5, ccn, c3)))
  cnco(c2, cii, c5, c0, c3)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(ccom(c0, c4), co(cii, ccn, c3)), wcel(c4, co(cii, ccn, c5)), wcel(c0, co(c5, ccn, c3)))
  cnco(c4, cii, c5, c0, c3)

blocks.name: phtpycc
blocks.content: Concatenate two path homotopies. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 7-Jun-2014.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: df-phtpc
blocks.content: Define the function which takes a topology and returns the path homotopy relation on that topology. Definition of [Hatcher] p. 25. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 7-Jun-2014.)

blocks.name: phtpcrel
blocks.content: The path homotopy relation is a relation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Jun-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 7-Aug-2014.)

blocks.name: isphtpc
blocks.content: The relation "is path homotopic to". (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 5-Sep-2015.)

  breqd(c0, (~ = ph ` c1), c2, { < hs1, hs2 > |((hs1 ‚àà(II[Cn]c1)‚àß hs2 ‚àà(II[Cn]c1))‚àß(hs1[(PHtpy ` c1)]hs2)‚â† ‚àÖ)}, c1 ‚àà Top)

  anbi12d(hs0 = c1, { hs1, hs2 } ‚äÜ(II[Cn]hs0), (hs1[(PHtpy ` hs0)]hs2)‚â† ‚àÖ, (hs1 ‚àà(II[Cn]c1)‚àß hs2 ‚àà(II[Cn]c1)), (hs1[(PHtpy ` c1)]hs2)‚â† ‚àÖ)
  syl6bbr(hs0 = c1, { hs1, hs2 } ‚äÜ(II[Cn]hs0), (hs1 ‚àà(II[Cn]c1)‚àß hs2 ‚àà(II[Cn]c1)), { hs1, hs2 } ‚äÜ(II[Cn]c1))

  oveqd(hs1, (PHtpy ` hs0), hs2, (PHtpy ` c1), hs0 = c1)
  fveq2(hs0, c1, cphtpy)
  df-phtpc(hs0, hs1, hs2)

blocks.name: phtpcer
blocks.content: Path homotopy is an equivalence relation. Proposition 1.2 of [Hatcher] p. 26. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jul-2015.) (Proof shortened by AV, 1-May-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm phtpcer(class c0) {
  |- wer(cfv(cphtpc, c0), co(cii, ccn, c0))
} = {
  iseri(hs0, hs1, hs2, cfv(cphtpc, c0), co(cii, ccn, c0))
  phtpcrel(c0)
  syl3anbrc(wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(cphtpc, c0), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), cfv(cphtpc, c0), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs1), co(cii, ccn, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(cii, ccn, c0)), wne(co(cv(hs1), cfv(cphtpy, c0), cv(hs0)), emptycls))
  exlimddv(hs3, wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(cphtpc, c0), cv(hs1)), wne(co(cv(hs1), cfv(cphtpy, c0), cv(hs0)), emptycls), wcel(cv(hs3), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cphtpy, c0), cv(hs1))))

blocks.name: phtpc01
blocks.content: Path homotopic paths have the same endpoints. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm phtpc01(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wbr(c0, cfv(cphtpc, c1), c2), wa(wceq(cfv(c0, nat0), cfv(c2, nat0)), wceq(cfv(c0, nat1), cfv(c2, nat1))))
} = {
  sylbi(wbr(c0, cfv(cphtpc, c1), c2), wa(wceq(cfv(c0, nat0), cfv(c2, nat0)), wceq(cfv(c0, nat1), cfv(c2, nat1))), w3a(wcel(c0, co(cii, ccn, c1)), wcel(c2, co(cii, ccn, c1)), wne(co(c0, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c2), emptycls)))
  isphtpc(c0, c1, c2)
  3impia(wcel(c0, co(cii, ccn, c1)), wcel(c2, co(cii, ccn, c1)), wne(co(c0, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c2), emptycls), wa(wceq(cfv(c0, nat0), cfv(c2, nat0)), wceq(cfv(c0, nat1), cfv(c2, nat1))))
  syl5bi(wa(wcel(c0, co(cii, ccn, c1)), wcel(c2, co(cii, ccn, c1))), wne(co(c0, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c2), emptycls), wa(wceq(cfv(c0, nat0), cfv(c2, nat0)), wceq(cfv(c0, nat1), cfv(c2, nat1))), wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c2))))
  n0(hs0, co(c0, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c2))
  exlimdv(hs0, wa(wcel(c0, co(cii, ccn, c1)), wcel(c2, co(cii, ccn, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c2)), wa(wceq(cfv(c0, nat0), cfv(c2, nat0)), wceq(cfv(c0, nat1), cfv(c2, nat1))))
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, co(cii, ccn, c1)), wcel(c2, co(cii, ccn, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c2)), wa(wceq(cfv(c0, nat0), cfv(c2, nat0)), wceq(cfv(c0, nat1), cfv(c2, nat1))))
  phtpy01(c0, c2, c1, cv(hs0), wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(cii, ccn, c1)), wcel(c2, co(cii, ccn, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c2))))
  simpll(wcel(c0, co(cii, ccn, c1)), wcel(c2, co(cii, ccn, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c2)))
  simplr(wcel(c0, co(cii, ccn, c1)), wcel(c2, co(cii, ccn, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c2)))
  simpr(wa(wcel(c0, co(cii, ccn, c1)), wcel(c2, co(cii, ccn, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, cfv(cphtpy, c1), c2))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, co(cii, ccn, c1)), wcel(c2, co(cii, ccn, c1))))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wceq(cfv(c0, nat0), cfv(c2, nat0)), wceq(cfv(c0, nat1), cfv(c2, nat1))))
}

  ex((c0 ‚àà(II[Cn]c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(II[Cn]c1)), hs0 ‚àà(c0[(PHtpy ` c1)]c2), ((c0 ` 0)=(c2 ` 0)‚àß(c0 ` 1)=(c2 ` 1)))
  phtpy01(c0, c2, c1, hs0, ((c0 ‚àà(II[Cn]c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(II[Cn]c1))‚àß hs0 ‚àà(c0[(PHtpy ` c1)]c2)))

  diff.hs0.c((c0[(PHtpy ` c1)]c2))
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ‚àà(II[Cn]c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(II[Cn]c1)))

}

blocks.name: reparpht
blocks.content: Reparametrization lemma. The reparametrization of a path by any continuous map ` G : II --> II ` with ` G ( 0 ) = 0 ` and ` G ( 1 ) = 1 ` is path-homotopic to the original path. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 15-Jun-2010.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm reparpht(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(ccom(c0, c1), cfv(cphtpc, c2), c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(cii, ccn, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, co(cii, ccn, cii)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c1, nat0), nat0))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c1, nat1), nat1))
} = {
  syl3anbrc(w0, wbr(ccom(c0, c1), cfv(cphtpc, c2), c0), wcel(ccom(c0, c1), co(cii, ccn, c2)), wcel(c0, co(cii, ccn, c2)), wne(co(ccom(c0, c1), cfv(cphtpy, c2), c0), emptycls))
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(ccom(c0, c1), co(cii, ccn, c2)), wcel(c1, co(cii, ccn, cii)), wcel(c0, co(cii, ccn, c2)))
  cnco(c1, cii, cii, c0, c2)
  ne0d(co(ccom(c0, c1), cfv(cphtpy, c2), c0), cmpo(hs0, hs1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cfv(c0, co(co(co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs1)), cmul, cfv(c1, cv(hs0))), caddc, co(cv(hs1), cmul, cv(hs0))))), w0)
  reparphti(hs0, hs1, cmpo(hs0, hs1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cfv(c0, co(co(co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs1)), cmul, cfv(c1, cv(hs0))), caddc, co(cv(hs1), cmul, cv(hs0))))), c0, c1, c2, w0)
  eqid(cmpo(hs0, hs1, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cfv(c0, co(co(co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs1)), cmul, cfv(c1, cv(hs0))), caddc, co(cv(hs1), cmul, cv(hs0))))))
  isphtpc(ccom(c0, c1), c2, c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
}

thm reparpht(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ‚àò c1)[(~=ph ` c2)]c0)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà(II[Cn]c2))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà(II[Cn]II))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c1 ` 0)= 0)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c1 ` 1)= 1)
} = {
  syl3anbrc(w0, (c0 ‚àò c1)[(~ = ph ` c2)]c0, (c0 ‚àò c1)‚àà(II[Cn]c2), c0 ‚àà(II[Cn]c2), ((c0 ‚àò c1)[(PHtpy ` c2)]c0)‚â† ‚àÖ)
  syl2anc(w0, (c0 ‚àò c1)‚àà(II[Cn]c2), c1 ‚àà(II[Cn]II), c0 ‚àà(II[Cn]c2))
  cnco(c1, cii, cii, c0, c2)
  ne0d(((c0 ‚àò c1)[(PHtpy ` c2)]c0), (hs0 ‚àà(0[[,]]1), hs1 ‚àà(0[[,]]1)‚Ü¶(c0 `(((1[-]hs1)[√ó](c1 ` hs0))[+](hs1[√ó]hs0)))), w0)
  reparphti(hs0, hs1, (hs0 ‚àà(0[[,]]1), hs1 ‚àà(0[[,]]1)‚Ü¶(c0 `(((1[-]hs1)[√ó](c1 ` hs0))[+](hs1[√ó]hs0)))), c0, c1, c2, w0)
  eqid((hs0 ‚àà(0[[,]]1), hs1 ‚àà(0[[,]]1)‚Ü¶(c0 `(((1[-]hs1)[√ó](c1 ` hs0))[+](hs1[√ó]hs0)))))
  isphtpc((c0 ‚àò c1), c2, c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
}

blocks.name: phtpcco2
blocks.content: Compose a path homotopy with a continuous map. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jul-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm phtpcco2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(ccom(c0, c1), cfv(cphtpc, c2), ccom(c0, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c1, cfv(cphtpc, c4), c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c4, ccn, c2)))
} = {
  syl3anbrc(w0, wbr(ccom(c0, c1), cfv(cphtpc, c2), ccom(c0, c3)), wcel(ccom(c0, c1), co(cii, ccn, c2)), wcel(ccom(c0, c3), co(cii, ccn, c2)), wne(co(ccom(c0, c1), cfv(cphtpy, c2), ccom(c0, c3)), emptycls))
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(ccom(c0, c1), co(cii, ccn, c2)), wcel(c1, co(cii, ccn, c4)), wcel(c0, co(c4, ccn, c2)))
  cnco(c1, cii, c4, c0, c2)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(ccom(c0, c3), co(cii, ccn, c2)), wcel(c3, co(cii, ccn, c4)), wcel(c0, co(c4, ccn, c2)))
  cnco(c3, cii, c4, c0, c2)
  exlimddv(hs0, w0, wne(co(ccom(c0, c1), cfv(cphtpy, c2), ccom(c0, c3)), emptycls), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cfv(cphtpy, c4), c3)))
  sylib(w0, wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cfv(cphtpy, c4), c3))), wne(co(c1, cfv(cphtpy, c4), c3), emptycls))
  simp3d(w0, wne(co(c1, cfv(cphtpy, c4), c3), emptycls), wcel(c1, co(cii, ccn, c4)), wcel(c3, co(cii, ccn, c4)))
  n0(hs0, co(c1, cfv(cphtpy, c4), c3))
  ne0d(co(ccom(c0, c1), cfv(cphtpy, c2), ccom(c0, c3)), ccom(c0, cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cfv(cphtpy, c4), c3))))
  phtpyco2(c0, cv(hs0), c1, c2, c3, c4, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cfv(cphtpy, c4), c3))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cfv(cphtpy, c4), c3)), wcel(c1, co(cii, ccn, c4)))
  simp1d(w0, wcel(c1, co(cii, ccn, c4)), wcel(c3, co(cii, ccn, c4)), wne(co(c1, cfv(cphtpy, c4), c3), emptycls))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cfv(cphtpy, c4), c3)), wcel(c3, co(cii, ccn, c4)))
  simp2d(w0, wcel(c3, co(cii, ccn, c4)), wcel(c1, co(cii, ccn, c4)), wne(co(c1, cfv(cphtpy, c4), c3), emptycls))
  sylib(w0, w3a(wcel(c1, co(cii, ccn, c4)), wcel(c3, co(cii, ccn, c4)), wne(co(c1, cfv(cphtpy, c4), c3), emptycls)), wbr(c1, cfv(cphtpc, c4), c3))
  isphtpc(c1, c4, c3)
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cfv(cphtpy, c4), c3)), wcel(c0, co(c4, ccn, c2)))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cfv(cphtpy, c4), c3)))
  isphtpc(ccom(c0, c1), c2, ccom(c0, c3))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(wne(co(ccom(c0, c1), cfv(cphtpy, c2), ccom(c0, c3)), emptycls))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c1, cfv(cphtpy, c4), c3))
}

  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ‚àò c1)[(~=ph ` c2)](c0 ‚àò c3))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1[(~=ph ` c4)]c3)

} = {
  syl3anbrc(w0, (c0 ‚àò c1)[(~ = ph ` c2)](c0 ‚àò c3), (c0 ‚àò c1)‚àà(II[Cn]c2), (c0 ‚àò c3)‚àà(II[Cn]c2), ((c0 ‚àò c1)[(PHtpy ` c2)](c0 ‚àò c3))‚â† ‚àÖ)
  syl2anc(w0, (c0 ‚àò c1)‚àà(II[Cn]c2), c1 ‚àà(II[Cn]c4), c0 ‚àà(c4[Cn]c2))
  cnco(c1, cii, c4, c0, c2)
  syl2anc(w0, (c0 ‚àò c3)‚àà(II[Cn]c2), c3 ‚àà(II[Cn]c4), c0 ‚àà(c4[Cn]c2))
  cnco(c3, cii, c4, c0, c2)
  exlimddv(hs0, w0, ((c0 ‚àò c1)[(PHtpy ` c2)](c0 ‚àò c3))‚â† ‚àÖ, hs0 ‚àà(c1[(PHtpy ` c4)]c3))
  sylib(w0, ‚àÉ(hs0, hs0 ‚àà(c1[(PHtpy ` c4)]c3)), (c1[(PHtpy ` c4)]c3)‚â† ‚àÖ)
